issue.title: [CI] Build timeouts on "AMD64 Windows RTools 35"
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8234](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8234). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
https://github.com/apache/arrow/runs/536074294?check_suite_focus=true

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8234?focusedCommentId=17067964) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
Judging from https://github.com/apache/arrow/actions?query=workflow%3AR+branch%3Amaster, it looks like this started when ARROW-8058 merged. Though it passed on that ticket's PR: https://github.com/apache/arrow/runs/533607009?check_suite_focus=true

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8234?focusedCommentId=17068196) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
We'll fix this in ARROW-8233 too.
